answerText: magnetic field[10] The curl of this vector field is equal to the magnetic field. When this quantity is nonzero, the wave function of an electron undergoes a phase shift while passing through a solenoid, in the Aharonov-Bohm effect.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Northwestern A | 17 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: According to Ampere's Law, the line integral of this quantity around a closed path is proportional to the total current passing through the area surrounded by the path. For 10 points each: [10] Name this vector field typically symbolized B and paired with the electric field.
